basic.description: This course will expose students to a wide variety of physical activities with the intent of learning fundamental pedagogical concepts relevant to structured (e.g. Physical Education) and unstructured (e.g. recreational) physical activity environments. Students will develop an activity lesson plan and effectively teach its content.
basic.subject: PACT
basic.title: Fundamental Practicum in Physical Activity

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Registration in a PHED Specialization Plan
